results.deck: THQ brings one of America's favorite game shows back to consoles in 2012 for PS3, Xbox 360, and Wii U.
results.name: Wheel of Fortune: Big Money

results.deck: A collection of the second, third and fourth Hitman games, remastered in HD with support for Achievements/Trophies.
results.name: Hitman HD Trilogy

results.deck: A direct sequel to the cult-classic Strategy RPG Disgaea: Hour of Darkness and the fifth game in the series. Laharl, Etna, and Flonne return in a new adventure with both classic and new monsters, classes, and features.
results.name: Disgaea D2: A Brighter Darkness

results.deck: The Guided Fate Paradox is Nippon Ichi's latest bizarre PS3 dungeon crawling RPG and a spiritual successor to Zettai Hero Project.
results.name: The Guided Fate Paradox

results.deck: A hunting game from Bigben Interactive.
results.name: Hunter's Trophy 2: Europa

results.deck: Turn based strategy game following the career of the legendary Gen. George Patton during World War II.
results.name: History Channel: Legends of War - Patton

results.deck: The eighth entry in the Dynasty Warriors franchise, released in western markets in July of 2013.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 8

results.deck: A Samurai Warriors Pachinko/Slot Machine.
results.name: Pachislot Sengoku Musou

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 14 is EA Sports' golf sim for the 2013 PGA season and the 16th game in the Tiger Woods franchise.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 14

results.deck: French lawn bowling at its finest.
results.name: Obut Pétanque 2

results.deck: The 2013 installment of Sony's baseball simulator. Includes an all-new playoff mode and a Beginner mode, as well as revamped Franchise and Diamond Dynasty modes.
results.name: MLB 13: The Show

results.deck: Third in SystemSoft's series of strategy games set in an anime girl-filled feudal Japan.
results.name: Sengoku Hime 3

results.deck: Set sail for the New World in another Dynasty Warriors-esque pirate journey.
results.name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 2

results.deck: The fifth entry in the Metal Gear Solid series recounts the adventures of Punished 'Venom' Snake, as he wakes up from a nine-year coma in 1984 to rebuild his mercenary paradise.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain

results.deck: Blood, souls, and tears are continually spent as players traverse the land of Drangleic in FromSoftware's third entry in the Souls series.
results.name: Dark Souls II

results.deck: A PS3 pachi-slot game, one of many such games based on Fist of the North Star.
results.name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken F - Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu

results.deck: J-Stars Victory Vs is a fighting game celebrating Shonen Jump's longevity.
results.name: J-Stars Victory Vs

results.deck: The focus moves to Erebonia in this branch of The Legend of Heroes' Trails sub-franchise. The game follow the newly established Class VII at Thors Military Academy through a tumultuous time in the empire as civil war looms on the horizon.
results.name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel

results.deck: Disney Infinity is an action-adventure video game based on Disney properties which uses physical toy figures. The game features in-game play sets and a toy box mode that allows users to create levels using mixed-and-matched content.
results.name: Disney Infinity

results.deck: New entry in the Heavy Fire series.
results.name: Heavy Fire: Shattered Spear

results.deck: Dai-2-Ji Super Robot Taisen OG is the sequel to Super Robot Taisen OG Gaiden.  Like its predecessors, it draws in original characters from other games of the franchise to craft a new story.
results.name: Dai-2-Ji Super Robot Taisen Original Generations

results.deck: The denizens of the Marvel Universe battle it out LEGO style.
results.name: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes

results.deck: 2K Sports' baseball sim for the 2013 season. Tampa Bay Rays' pitcher and reigning Cy Young award winner David Price is featured on the cover.
results.name: MLB 2K13

results.deck: The 2013 installment in the MotoGP franchise.
results.name: MotoGP13

results.deck: Date A Live: Rinne Utopia is a dating sim based on a light novel series authored by Koshi Tachibana and illustrated by Tsunako.
results.name: Date A Live: Rinne Utopia

results.deck: A re-release of Dragon's Dogma, Dark Arisen includes a new high level area with new monsters and quests from the original, as well as a handful of refinements to the original game.
results.name: Dragon's Dogma: Dark Arisen

results.deck: A visual novel, intended as a spin-off to Steins Gate. It was written by Naotaka Hayashi once again, as a collaboration with Zero Escape writer Kotaro Uchikoshi.
results.name: Steins;Gate: Senkei Kousoku no Phenogram

results.deck: The 2013 entry in Konami's long-running Japanese baseball series.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2013

results.deck: Celebrating 25 years of John Madden Football. No correlation to the year 2025.
results.name: Madden NFL 25

results.deck: The sequel to Mugen Souls features a new heroine attempting to take over the universe and become the undisputed god.
results.name: Mugen Souls Z

results.deck: Yank the top half of a Skylanders toy off of its base and connect it to a different bottom half to make new combinations in the third Skylanders game.
results.name: Skylanders SWAP Force

results.deck: The sixth main installment of the Assassin's Creed franchise, set in the Caribbean during the age of piracy in the early 18th century. Players explore the memories of Edward Kenway, a charismatic pirate (turned reckless Assassin) and the grandfather of Connor Kenway, the protagonist of Assassin's Creed III.
results.name: Assassin's Creed IV: Black Flag

results.deck: The tenth installment of the long-running shooter franchise introduces a brand new storyline, where the United States is under threat from a coalition of South American nations, and must employ a special group of operatives known as "Ghosts" to survive.
results.name: Call of Duty: Ghosts

results.deck: A supernatural mystery game in which Ronan O’Connor, deceased detective, tries to solve his own murder.
results.name: Murdered: Soul Suspect

results.deck: Game celebrating the 30th anniversary of the Macross series.
results.name: Macross 30: The Voice that Connects the Galaxy

results.deck: PlayStation 3 role-playing game from Nippon Ichi based on the collectible card game by the same name.
results.name: Zillions of Enemy X: Zetsukai no Crusade

results.deck: A direct sequel/expansion to Armored Core V developed by FromSoftware for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
results.name: Armored Core: Verdict Day

results.deck: WWE 2K14 is the first WWE game to be published by 2K Games.
results.name: WWE 2K14

results.deck: Game based on the Turbo movie by DreamWorks
results.name: Turbo: Super Stunt Squad

results.deck: An ordinary mercenary is possessed by a fire demon, who just might grant the power to save the world from a massive army of the undead, in this fantasy action-RPG by French developer Spiders.
results.name: Bound By Flame

results.deck: Drakengard 3 brings the series's trademark mixture of hack and slash combat and unorthodox storytelling to the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Drakengard 3

results.deck: In Sniper Elite III, players once again take on the role of World War II sniper Karl Fairburne, this time as he travels to Northern Africa to uncover a secret Nazi plot.
results.name: Sniper Elite III

results.deck: Firebrand and Activision's new racer based on the crazy (and) successful movie franchise, bringing storylines from earlier movies together to lead up to Fast 6.
results.name: Fast & Furious: Showdown

results.deck: A platformer that takes inspiration from both Super Hexagon and Super Meat Boy. The game tasks players with ending the tyrannical rule of the Groove-Wizard.
results.name: Electronic Super Joy

results.deck: A collection for PS3, PS4, Vita and PC, containing Final Fantasy X International and Final Fantasy X-2 International + Last Mission featuring HD visuals and a remastered soundtrack.
results.name: Final Fantasy X/X-2 HD Remaster

results.deck: The Director's Cut of Deus Ex: Human Revolution features redone boss battles, improved graphics, A.I. and combat, and all DLC released for the original game. The Wii U version makes use of the controller's screen to allow new features like map notes.
results.name: Deus Ex: Human Revolution Director's Cut

results.deck: A 2.5D hand-drawn recreation of the original NES classic and fan favorite platformer by Capcom. Developed by WayForward.
results.name: DuckTales: Remastered

results.deck: The fifteenth game in the the long running Atelier series by Gust and the second installment in the "Dusk Trilogy."
results.name: Atelier Escha & Logy: Alchemists of the Dusk Sky

results.deck: The fourth main entry in Capcom's historical fiction brawler.
results.name: Sengoku Basara 4

results.deck: 2013 edition of Tecmo Koei's long running horse racing simulator.
results.name: Winning Post 7 2013

results.deck: A 2013 bullet hell shooter from Moss.
results.name: Caladrius

results.deck: Two years after beginning his crime-fighting career, Batman faces his toughest challenge ever when the crime lord known as Black Mask hires the eight deadliest assassins in the DC Universe to kill the vigilante who has been interfering in his operations.
results.name: Batman: Arkham Origins

results.deck: An action adventure spin-off from the Invizimals franchise for the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Invizimals: The Lost Kingdom

results.deck: A football simulator played in god mode.
results.name: Lords of Football

results.deck: Super Mega Baseball is a arcade-style simulation baseball game from Metalhead Software.
results.name: Super Mega Baseball

results.deck: Based on the film of the same name.
results.name: The Smurfs 2

results.deck: Driftopia was set to be a repackaged version of Ridge Racer Unbounded, but it never left open beta and was shut down in mid-2014.
results.name: Ridge Racer Driftopia

results.deck: Expanded version of the 2007 subscription MMO based on the Monster Hunter franchise.
results.name: Monster Hunter Frontier G

results.deck: A new adaption of the Games Workshop Board game, released in 2013 and developed by Full Control.
results.name: Space Hulk

results.deck: The 22nd installment in the EA Sports NHL franchise.
results.name: NHL 14

results.deck: A visual novel sequel to Liberation Maiden for the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Vita.
results.name: Liberation Maiden SIN

results.deck: A visual novel that serves as a prequel to the BlazBlue universe for PlayStation 3 and Vita.
results.name: XBlaze Code: Embryo

results.deck: The 2014 installment in EA Canada's soccer simulation franchise. This was the first in the franchise to bridge the 360/PS3 to Xbox One/PS4 gap.
results.name: FIFA 14

results.deck: The second entry in Aquaplus' SRPG series for the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Tears to Tiara II: Heir of the Overlord

results.deck: The 2013 entry in EA Sports' college football franchise, featuring former Michigan Quarterback Denard Robinson on the cover.
results.name: NCAA Football 14

results.deck: A Metal Gear compilation consisting of the previous "Metal Gear Solid HD Collection" and much more.
results.name: Metal Gear Solid: The Legacy Collection 1987-2012

results.deck: Rugby Challenge 2 is a rugby simulation game featuring over 100 licensed teams. It is released under slightly different names in many territories by the Wellington-based developer, Sidhe Interactive.
results.name: Rugby Challenge 2

results.deck: A visual novel adaptation of the Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse light novels and anime, it is a side story of Muv-Luv Alternative that follows the test pilots at humanity's main R&D facility in Alaska.
results.name: Muv-Luv Alternative: Total Eclipse

results.deck: The latest entry in the venerable shooter franchise takes place in a version of the 1960s in which the Nazis have established a global empire after winning World War II. Protagonist B.J. Blazkowicz fights for an underground resistance movement, outnumbered and outgunned by high-tech Nazi forces.
results.name: Wolfenstein: The New Order

results.deck: A cross-gen open-world driving game set in a fictional Redview County.
results.name: Need for Speed Rivals

results.deck: Upgraded release of Dead or Alive 5, including: DOA5+ feature integration, more characters, stages, costumes and BGM customization options.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate

results.deck: A platformer based on the 2013 Pac-Man CGI animated series.
results.name: Pac-Man and the Ghostly Adventures

results.deck: The fifteenth installment of 2K Sports' basketball sim arrives just in time for the 2013-14 NBA season.
results.name: NBA 2K14

results.deck: An entry in the Nobunaga's Ambition franchise for the PS3 and PC, timed to celebrate the thirtieth anniversary of the series.
results.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence

results.deck: Second game set on the Ben 10: Omniverse cartoon
results.name: Ben 10: Omniverse 2

results.deck: The 5th installment in the Guilty Gear franchise. It is the first in the Xrd series and is directed by Guilty Gear Creator Daisuke Ishiwatari.
results.name: Guilty Gear Xrd -SIGN-

results.deck: An enhanced version Ragnarok Odyssey with new features and content, including a randomly generated dungeon.
results.name: Ragnarok Odyssey Ace

results.deck: The third game in the Masou Kishin sidestory of the Super Robot Wars' classic timeline.
results.name: Super Robot Taisen OG Saga: Masou Kishin III: Pride of Justice

results.deck: Done in the style of Dynasty Warriors, the player controls one of the Kamen Riders as he battles through a series of enemies. The game mainly features the protagonists of the Heisei era of Kamen Rider, starting with 2000's Kamen Rider Kuuga and featuring up to 2013's Kamen Rider Wizard.
results.name: Kamen Rider Battride War

results.deck: Finn, Jake and others must save the Candy Kingdom by exploring the mysterious Secret Royal Dungeon deep below the Land of Ooo.
results.name: Adventure Time: Explore the Dungeon Because I DON’T KNOW!

results.deck: Cyanide's cycling game for the 2013 Tour de France.
results.name: Le Tour de France 2013 - 100th Edition

results.deck: Wonder Flick is a treasure-hunting RPG from Level-5 for iOS and Android.
results.name: Wonder Flick

results.deck: An upcoming side-scrolling action RPG by Nippon Ichi.
results.name: Battle Princess of Arcadias

results.deck: An HD compilation of Tales of Symphonia (GCN/PS2) and Tales of Symphonia: Dawn of the New World (Wii) for the PS3.
results.name: Tales of Symphonia Chronicles

results.deck: Crossover SRPG featuring characters from many different anime franchises.
results.name: Super Heroine Chronicle

results.deck: Debut RPG for Compile Heart's Galapagos RPG brand.
results.name: Fairy Fencer F

results.deck: Pro Evo returns for another season.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2014

results.deck: The second entry in the strategy game series inspired by three kingdoms era China.
results.name: Sangoku Hime 2

results.deck: Plants and Zombies are once again pitted against each other in this class-based third-person shooter developed by Popcap Games.
results.name: Plants vs. Zombies: Garden Warfare

results.deck: New entry in Sega's Japanese soccer management series.
results.name: Sakatsuku: Pro Soccer Club o Tsukurou!

results.deck: The new title in Ubisoft's hugely successful dance game franchise.
results.name: Just Dance 2014

results.deck: The second edition of Rocksmith from Ubisoft features a new soundtrack, enhancements to the user interface, and a slew of new games and lessons aimed at helping learn how to play the guitar.
results.name: Rocksmith 2014

results.deck: Another Wonderbook title developed in association with J.K. Rowling's Pottermore, this time players get to try their hand at potion-making with the PS Move.
results.name: Wonderbook: Book of Potions

results.deck: The mysterious Magus must discover who he is and why he was imprisoned in this console action RPG.
results.name: Magus

results.deck: Four-player simultaneous fighting game set in the Dragon Ball Z universe.
results.name: Dragon Ball Z: Battle of Z

results.deck: Saint Seiya: Brave Soldiers is a fighting game set in the Saint Seiya universe.
results.name: Saint Seiya: Brave Soldiers

results.deck: The 2013 entry in Konami's arcadey Powerful Pro baseball franchise.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2013

results.deck: A 2D fighting game spin-off from the Koihime Musou franchise, where where the generals of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms have been reimagined as anime heroines.
results.name: Shin Koihime Musou: Otome Taisen Sangokushi Engi

results.deck: Visual novel about a boy raised as a girl by his mother due to a mysterious mark on his body.
results.name: Rui wa Tomo o Yobu

results.deck: A director's cut edition of Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3, and Naruto's official PC game debut.
results.name: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Burst
